extendedInfo.description: SOS Radio plays the greatest Christian music on your phone! Download this app and be part of a community of believers from all over the world. You can stream commercial free Christian music, you can rate the songs while they play, post prayer requests, text in song requests and connect on social media. SOS Radio plays commercial free music from bands like Casting Crowns, Mercy Me, Chris Tomlin, Newsboys, Third Day, Switchfoot, Kutless, Jeremy Camp, Steven Curtis Chapman & More! The SOS Radio Network broadcast in Nevada, California, Arizona, Utah, Montana, Idaho, New Mexico, Florida & Wyoming, You can find our local radio stations at www.sosradio.netTake control of the music on SOS Radio and download this app!Other Features:- Current song & artist info!- Song & artist info updated even when stream isn't playing, giving you the option to tune in when you see your favorite songs playing!- Recently played song list!- Website, Facebook page, & Twitter page links!- Radio stream plays in the background!- Radio stream autoplays upon launch!- Tweet what you're listening to and other social sharing features!- Prayer request system!- "Call DJ" song request button!- Thumbs Up/Down song voting!

reviews.title: Very Happy Now!
reviews.comment: It looks as though every part of this app is now working. So great to have SOS on the go.  Thank you to those who made this happen. God bless you.
reviews.author: David Weberg

reviews.title: New version problems
reviews.comment: I have Android 2.3 and no longer can see the names of the songs and the people singing them the text DJ and call DJ do not work nothing works on the wheel. Going to remove it and reinstall that did not work so I\'m going to uninstall the app
reviews.author: Phil H

reviews.title: It works!!!!
reviews.comment: Finally SOS is working on my Motorola Razor! TY!
reviews.author: Wanda Jewitt

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: I have a LG Lucid and the app doesn\'t work. Keeps saying the app has dropped yet it never started. Anything to be done to help this? I would love to be able to listen to your station on my phone.
reviews.author: Angela Corr

reviews.title: Please fix asap
reviews.comment: I have a HTC vivid, it keeps saying unfortunately it has stopped working.... Pretty please fix, I miss my favorite radio station...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nothing...
reviews.comment: The app shut down before it even started... the first THREE times I opened it. Nexus 4. As much as the app is promoted on the radio, they should really invest in the app.
reviews.author: Roberta OchoaCaruso

reviews.title: Immediate force close.
reviews.comment: I love listening to this station in my car and wanted to get the app for my phone but it just quits before it starts. Please fix!
reviews.author: Kristine L

reviews.title: Great app!!
reviews.comment: Would love it if music could keep playing while I explore other apps, but overall good app!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: I\'ve had this app for several months and has not played once on galaxy s2. I\'m bummedbecause I love SOS and really want to play it for my coworker. Still doesn\'t work after 6 months
reviews.author: Daniela Moncada

reviews.title: Prefect for a long day at work
reviews.comment: This is a great app to have to listen to while you\'re at work. Awesome music!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very unique radio app
reviews.comment: I love that I can rate the songs while they play. Ive never seen that feature on a radio app. So cool. The prayer wall is sweet too.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!!!
reviews.comment: Glad SOS has it\'s own app now. Keeps everyone even more connected...allowing prayer requests too is awesome!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love this station!
reviews.comment: Love love SOS radio. Although not working since downloading ice cream sandwich.... Program just force closes
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The station that saved my faith
reviews.comment: I\'ve gone through so many trials and tribulations in the past 2-3 years, and being only 22, the Lord had faith in me and my strength and I realized this by listening to SOS radio. It is a true blessing and I can\'t thank the people behind the scenes enough. Praise be to the Father almighty. And may God bless us all!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I love this!!!
reviews.comment: Sos is great whenever im having a bad day or just any day i turn it on and i feel at ease. Thank u sos!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Perfect to listen to at work to keep me focused on working for my real boss!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Luv but takes a long time to load
reviews.author: Art Sturdivant

reviews.title: I guys r great
reviews.comment: Iv taken the thirty day challenge and im in awe with ur station im a recovering drug addict and have 6 months clean when i fill my self doing or tryin to get back tk sny worldly ways i turn sos on and i just get the greatet peace noing o can turn to sos and no i do matter so thsnks sos  l
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: App not working!
reviews.comment: I used to have this app on my Evo and loved it. Since I upgraded to my S3 it just keeps force closing. Please help!
reviews.author: Jean Advincula

reviews.title: Dosnt work
reviews.comment: I like it but it dosnt work. Every time pause button it dosnt pause it just makes the music eco and its really annoying.
